name: Silver Sword
desc: A sword for exorcising demons. Everyone knows it's made of a silver alloy, not pure silver.

desc.text:
Despite how the folk belief would have it, silver does not actually have any special ability to exorcise.
It is the pure heart of the wandering exorcist that is the true bane of evil.

value.text:
Chests
Investigation Spots
Wagner's Shop (Mondstadt's Blacksmith)
Master Zhang's Shop (Liyue's Blacksmith)
Hajime's Shop (Inazuma's Blacksmith)
Ahangar's Shop (Sumeru's Blacksmith)

customize.name: Wagner
customize.desc: Mondstadt's blacksmith who despises small talks and prefers being left to his work.

customize.name: Hajime
customize.desc: He is an apprentice swordsmith and Amenoma Tougo's senior disciple.

customize.name: Silver Sword

customize.name: Ahangar
customize.desc: The blacksmith at Shamshir's Smithy. Iradj and Dwarkanath are his adopted children.

customize.name: Old Merc's Pal
customize.desc: A battle-tested greatsword that has seen better days and worse.

customize.name: Iron Point
customize.desc: Sharp and pointy at one end, it is a balanced weapon that is quite popular among travelers.

customize.name: Pocket Grimoire
customize.desc: A carefully compiled notebook featuring the essentials needed to pass a magic exam.

customize.name: Seasoned Hunter's Bow
customize.desc: A bow that has been well-polished by time and meticulously cared for by its owner. It feels almost like an extension of the archer's arm.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Tile of Decarabian's Tower
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
The place now known as Stormterror's Lair was once the capital city of Decarabian, the God of Storms. Since this dream of prosperity was created entirely by his divine might, the broken pieces left behind by the shattering of that dream still possess great power.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Heavy Horn
materials.desc: A crude horn used by hilichurls to warn each other. Given the damage to the horn, it won't be warning anyone any time soon.

materials.name: Firm Arrowhead
materials.desc: A roughly produced arrowhead. Though unimpressive, neither it nor the bow should be underestimated, for even the bravest knight can be felled by an arrow from the rear.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Debris of Decarabian's City
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Decarabian, the God of Storms, was content with the capital city he had raised, and accepted the worship of the people from atop his tower. But he knew not that the people did not bow to him out of respect or adoration.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.

materials.name: Mora
materials.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

materials.name: Fragment of Decarabian's Epic
materials.desc:
Weapon Ascension Material.
Andrius once declared war upon Decarabian, but failed to even scratch the capital of the Lord of the Tower. If it were not for the song of freedom that shattered the city in an instant, Decarabian's dream would have gone on forever.

materials.name: Black Bronze Horn
materials.desc: A metallic monster horn that can only be obtained from especially strong hilichurls, since blowing on the horn takes real strength.

materials.name: Sharp Arrowhead
materials.desc: A well-made arrowhead. Sharp enough to penetrate armor with the ease of a rock through the surface of water.
